text: (Men eltani kadi) Sulaymaana henndu ndun: dawol mayru ko yeru (yaadu) lewru, kirndol mayru kadi ko yeru (yaadu) lewu. Men honcinani mo ɓunndu sila (kire). Hino jinnaaji ɗin, golliraynooɗi yeeso makko, e duŋayee Joomi Makko. Kala ooñiingii e majji, gaay e yamiroore Amen nden, Men meeɗina ngii lepte dulɓoowe ngen
